title: Lithium: How to Manage Dosage
itunes:title: Lithium: How to Manage Dosage
description:
How do you titrate lithium doses? In this episode, Dr. David Osser discusses practical insights on lithium dosing and monitoring strategies. 

Guest: David Osser, M.D. 
Interviewer: Mohan Gautam, D.O. 
Hosts: Jessica Diaz, M.D.; Flavio Guzman, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 0.5 CMEs: Lithium: How to Manage Dosage andSide Effects and Persuade Patients toTake It - Interview with David Osser, M.D.
